attributes.action: Speed up the autism diagnosis for children across the whole of the Uk
attributes.additional_details: The speed of diagnosis for autistic children and family support needs a huge injection of attention and financial backing . Get these kids and family support quicker .
attributes.background: Get faster better diagnosis and care and support for autism in our children and support for there families

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund an NHS fast-track route for ADHD & autism diagnoses and treatment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736475
